name: SantaSavesChristmas
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: santa saves christmas
des:
Santa needs your help to save Christmas.

Santa has been busy leaving gifts around the world. But the naughty elves dropped presents off his sleigh and he can't remember where! 

Listen to the elves' journey and see if you can remember:

• Where the presents have been hidden?
• What colour the presents were?
• How many presents were left?

Will you be able to remember where all the presents have been left and save Christmas?

Features:

• Random locations and presents means no two adventures are the same
• Funny and surprising sound effects
• Cute graphics for screen devices
• Score saving
